original_text: Their kings built their palaces too near to my holy temple. There was only a wall between me and them. They did many disgusting things that spoiled the honour of my holy name. As a result, I became very angry with them and I destroyed them.
korean_text: 그들이 그 문지방을 내 문지방 곁에 두며 그 문설주를 내 문설주 곁에 두어서 그들과 나 사이에 겨우 한 담이 막히게 하였고 또 그 행하는 가증한 일로 내 거룩한 이름을 더럽혔으므로 내가 노하여 멸망시켰거니와

sentences.original_text: too near to my holy temple
There was only a wall between me and them
sentences.korean_translation: 나와 그들 사이에는 단지 벽만 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: that spoiled the honour of my holy name
As a result, I became very angry with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 나는 그들에게 매우 분노했습니다
